pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Data from the NASS 'Quick Stats' API // Interface to access data via the United States Department of Agriculture's National Agricultural Statistical Service (NASS) 'Quick Stats' web API https://quickstats.nass.usda.gov/api. Convenience functions facilitate building queries based on available parameters and valid parameter values. This product uses the NASS API but is not endorsed or certified by NASS.
